# Vision

- [ML Vision Camera Stream](https://github.com/santetis/flutter_camera_ml_vision) [135⭐] - ML vision recognitions (QRcode, face, ...) with live camera stream by [Aumard Jimmy](https://github.com/jaumard) and [Santetis](https://github.com/santetis).
- [Google Mobile Vision](https://github.com/edufolly/flutter_mobile_vision) [340⭐] - Google Mobile Vision by [Eduardo Folly](https://github.com/edufolly).

## Augmented Reality

- [ARKit Plugin](https://github.com/olexale/arkit_flutter_plugin) [418⭐] - Wrapper for ARKit - Apple's augmented reality platform for iOS by [Olexandr Leuschenko](https://github.com/olexale).
- [ARCore Plugin](https://github.com/giandifra/arcore_flutter_plugin) [170⭐] - Augmented reality with ARCore platform by [Gian Marco Di Francesco](https://github.com/giandifra).
